Reviews.Title: SVAT PI1000
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Covert MPEG4 DVR - Recording System with Built-in Color Pinhole Surveillance Camera Hidden in a Motion SensorThis is a supper covert motion sensor little camera.  Lots of modes, qualities and sensitivity to choose from in the menu.  Stand alone with batteries or use supplied 12v adapter.  I called Support to ask a couple of questions and the guy was unrushed and pleasant. You can paint or camouflage all but the lens, so concealment will be easy. The motion sensor is through the pinhole lens at the bottom. Plays on your TV or load to computer with card reader.  The picture quality is very acceptable and in color. I'm tempted to spring for another one.  Keep an eye on your vehicle or campsite while your off having fun.Rob

Reviews.Title: Does not work well in continuous mode with over write.
Reviews.Author: D. Huynh
Reviews.Content: This video recording does not work well when I put it in continuous mode.I wanted it to record over the beginning when memory is filled.What happened is it will record and play back properly untill the memory is filled up. After that the screen goes blank (black) every other second. This makes it very hard to view the video. It may miss some action when you need it. It is ashamed such a good product with a bad bug.

Reviews.Title: Great product to catch wrongdoers!
Reviews.Author: T. Burnam
Reviews.Content: At first I debated this product due to mixed reviews, but knew I had to at least try it. The installation is not difficult at all. If you're hands on and like tinkering with things then this is for you. The instruction book will make it seem harder to operate than it really is. One you plug it in and get it going you can easily navigate the menu screen and figure out how to get it working, but it works! As for lighting you will need to place this in a well lit area, so don't put it facing sunlight or bright light or it's pointless. At night time there is nothing but darkness because this is not a night vision ready camera. I love that it comes with an SD storage card that you can also view from your laptop computer and the quality is also clear. I tried it on Media Player on Windows Vistas and it worked, but you don't need a computer to playback. The video will play back on a t.v. if you have the audio video plug-ins, can be hooked up to the ones on a VCR, DVD, or DVR. As for batteries it's still working pretty well with standard energizer batteries that aren't lithium, but there is also an AC adapter included it can run off of. If you want to use that you need to mount the camera (mounting bracket included) close to a wall plug. The mounting bracket is not difficult to install, it has a a small circular mounting plate with three screws, plus and extended arm, which I left off and just used the swivel bracket which will tighten once you know the direction you want the camera pointing. I like the product it is on the pricey side, but well worth catching shady people, especially if you live in an apartment building where too many people from management to maintenance have keys to your place and you can't always know when they come. If the price ever goes down I would be quick to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, great video. great price!
Reviews.Author: B. Hodges "Liloleladi"
Reviews.Content: Bought this because someone was taking the bulbs out of garage light.  Thought I knew... this proved it .. every bit from entering yard to taking bulb.  Clear video, gets only the action when in motion mode. Small card holds days of video clips.  Setting on next to least sensitive... it got a grasshopper who flew in front of it..  Can't say enough about the qualitiy of this camera.  It also greatly impressed the deputy who saw it before suggesting the bulb stealer stay out of my yard. I had it plugged in electricity. The videos are extremely clear for at least 60 feet... and that is from inside building looking out.  Can't say enough about the amazing quality.

Reviews.Title: super product
Reviews.Author: S Soko
Reviews.Content: We purchased the SVAT PI100 Covert DVR about three weeks ago when a neighbor alerted us to a suspicious vehicle in our neighborhood.  We set the device for motion detection and a timer. As fate would have it we were victims of a home burglary just yesterday.  The covert DVR captured both intruders in full color with clear views of their faces and even tatoos.  The Sherrif was pleased as well. We would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: SVAT PI1000 Covert MPEG4 DVR
Reviews.Author: G. Smallwood "GMS"
Reviews.Content: SVAT Electronics Covert MPEG4 DVR With Built-In Color Pinhole Camera in PIR Sensor  This Camera was easy to set up and takes just seconds however but you need a TV with digital hold in order to set it up.  Which is easy if you have a TV less than 10 yrs old.  I bought an old TV to try to monitor and set up several SVAT systems but it didn't work.  As soon as I hooked it up to a newer TV it worked perfectly an was set up in seconds.

Reviews.Title: Low quality video
Reviews.Author: R. Bell "Prizepatrol"
Reviews.Content: Even if you set the video quality to high-res, the images are so poor that you could not recognize enough facial features to identify an intruder in your house. It took me about a month to get my full refund, but the company finally did return the money. This would have been a good device had the video been of better quality.

Reviews.Title: Poor camera
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I have this camera plugged in on a shelf about 3 feet high facing the front door and living room area.  It needs very bright light to be able to see anything.  I have it set to start recording for very low movement, but it will not pick up movement for at least 5 seconds.  That is enough time for me to open my door and close it and get to or past the camera before it even comes on (about 40 feet in distance).  It was a complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: SVAT PI1000 DVR
Reviews.Author: M. Tercero
Reviews.Content: This little DVR system is really good. so far it's been reliable, fairly easy to setup and it has good picture. The view angle is just enough but wider would be better and it needs to be placed in some lighted area to work.Mariano T.

Reviews.Title: Great hidden recording system
Reviews.Author: Gadget Guru
Reviews.Content: This system worked great as a discreet camera and recording system. Everyone thought it was just a regular motion sensor with no recording capabilities. All the controls are on the back of the unit and you just pop out the SD card when you want to see what you caught on camera!

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: The camera constantly shuts down and discontinues recording. It switches between record and play which makes constant recording impossible. I bought it for an internal investigation at work and it is a waste of my money... Called customer service once and the man had a complete attitude with me. I won't buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: battery hoger
Reviews.Author: Yogini Benegalrao "Hillibilli"
Reviews.Content: It is a good product but hogs on batteries and they recommend lithium batteries which are expensive it is good for one day but for long term you have to have a power source to connect its power adapter.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: C. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what it says it will do. I was a little intimidated by the reviews that said it would be hard to set up but even though the instruction booklet sucks, it was pretty much straight forward. A little trial and error to get it working like I wanted it to and I was done.I would prefer it to be wireless for the setup because I have it installed high on the wall and had to get a ladder to place a TV on top because I couldn't get a cable long enough.I'll buy another one if I need it somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: PI1000
Reviews.Author: R. E. Williams
Reviews.Content: There is a learning curve on setting this up, but not all that steep, and quite a bit of it is intuitive.About yhe only quibbles I have is that I can find no reference in the instruction and spec manual to the fact that if the power is cut, the installed batteries do not appear to keep it running. At least, the video output goes away and the SD card didn't show anything when I pulled it.Which does somewhat defeat its purpose.Second qubble is that unless disguised as something else, which, fortunately, isn't all that tricky since it isn't all that big, its appearance is more likely to draw attention than get it ignored by the sort of people one least would want to do this, since they would be more likely simply to take it, along with whatever they came for, than not.Which would also rather defeat its purpose.Leaving those two caveats aside, it is a very neat device, and the one I bought came with a 2 GB SD chip rather than the 1 GB SD I expected.Since I did not know for sure exactly where I would wind up wanting it, and its size makes it quite portable, I mounted it on a wheel from a 5" caster since it is not designed to stand up by itself, and this made placing it upright on a shelf with the best tilt much simpler. And permits concealment of both the power and video feed cords.Would be better if the video jack were not on the top of the unit, would make disguising its function a bit easier.Or else a right-angle flat black video plug were provided with the PI1000.Or failing this, The video output were resettable so as to let the PI1000 lie on its side while still providing an upright image.It is supposed to be covert, after all, and a bright yellow video connector sticking out of the top doesn't really do much for this.Too eye-catching.Sorry about that.

Reviews.Title: Spy Camera
Reviews.Author: Da Boz "BoyBoz"
Reviews.Content: This camera does a great job accordong to its features. The product is clear and sharp. Lighting is needed as with any surveillance camera to produce discernable images. It would be better if this camera could be wired to feed a computer.

Reviews.Title: You WILL need to plug this in.
Reviews.Author: N. Wood
Reviews.Content: I have been playing with this camera for a week now.  It has a lot of good things going for it, which are mentioned in other reviews: very good video quality with sufficient lighting, useful modes of operation and it is easy to review the captured images on any reasonably new television. However- and it's a biggie!-you WILL need to use the power adapter instead of trying to run it using batteries..  I put in 4 new AA batteries at first and tried it out.  I placed the camera in motion mode. The batteries shot about 5 minutes of footage in an 8 hour period before they stopped.  I bought the recommended lithium batteries.  In fact, I bought the ER "Ultimate" Lithium batteries.  At $10 for 4 of these, I was certainly hoping for a good result. What I got was less than 15 minutes of footage in a 12 hour period before they stopped. I thought for sure something was defective with my camera, but the next time I connected with the power cord and it filmed just as I had hoped.  Now, the problem is, that the manual would leave you to believe you could get 12 hours of footage using lithium batteries.  Instead, what you get is 12 hours of monitoring by the camera with very little (in my case, less than 15 minutes of footage).  I spoke with customer service at SVAT and was told that this camera is ONLY meant to be used with a power cord and that the batteries were ONLY to be used as backup.  I would have liked to have known that before I made the purchase.  That's why I'm telling you.  It may very well make a difference in whether or not you can use this for home surveillance. I am not sure where I can place the camera that I can hide the cord.  It is supposed to look like a motion sensor in an existing security system.  None of my motion sensors have wires dangling from them.  Worse, the cord is only 5 ft. or 1.5m long, so you will almost certainly need an extension cord to plug that power adapter into a wall outlet.  So now you have a sensor with a cord hanging down, connecting in the middle of the wall to an extension cord which runs to the power outlet. Not exactly discreet!  You may find a place you can use the device, but you should know on the front end that that will depend upon whether or not you have a very nearby power outlet where a "motion sensor" would look appropriate.

Reviews.Title: Good so Far
Reviews.Author: nannycam
Reviews.Content: Equipment seems to work just fine, easy to set up.  Very difficult to plug in and hide (size and color and short power cord).  Picture very good, options for set up very good.  Wish it worked better in lower light, but overall very good piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This surveillance camera is exactly what I wanted. It is very easy to set up and can run on continuous, manual or motion detection.  Using the SD card it is very easy to replay the video on your computer. Light & non-intrusive.

Reviews.Title: great product, no customer service
Reviews.Author: B. sayers
Reviews.Content: great product, speedy delivery, product is as promised. poor instruction set and  if you need to ask a question, you had better be fluent in a foreign language. unable to communicate with foreign service desk...its a shame to have to rely on out of country support for seemingly simple questions. i could not understand a word they were trying to say...

Reviews.Title: No night motion detection at all
Reviews.Author: Rodney Davies
Reviews.Content: This takes crystal clear images in the daylight.  At night the sensor can't detect something 1 inch in front of it even with the sensor turned all the way up.

Reviews.Title: Not what I spected
Reviews.Author: jose Treminio
Reviews.Content: I'm used to see video quality from Go Pro camera and this is very poor in my opinion + such a narrow angle and no volume wich are very important.Too much money for that quality

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Townsend
Reviews.Content: Camera works as advertised. It needs a lot of light to capture clear images at night. A regular table Lompoc is not enough; you need an overhead light fixture. The design makes it easy to hide.

Reviews.Title: Excellent security camera!
Reviews.Author: K. King
Reviews.Content: I discovered this camera when doing a search on google for the meaning of a term, and this camera's manual was posted online and answered the question.I ordered one and have found it an easy-to-use, excellent security camera. Get two memory cards, like 8 GB in size, and when you turn the camera off to take one card out to review it, put the other in and turn the camera back on, so that there's no interruption in coverage. We caught a neighborhood robber on ours. He robbed a home two houses down from ours, then walked past our house with his loot. We were able to extract that footage, transfer it to a CD, and give it to the neighbor so he could give it to police. I understand they caught the robber, who was connected to a gang of other robbers.We are extremely pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: again I need a headline
Reviews.Author: Ronald J Wilson
Reviews.Content: this item is fine and I don`t like to be required to write to write so many words if I cant just rate item I wont rate any.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Emilio
Reviews.Content: Useless in todays world, do not buy something this old or silly ,,,the video is terrible , setup is terrible downloading is terrible

Reviews.Title: Great hidden camera!!
Reviews.Author: thomas phan
Reviews.Content: This little unit pretty much has everything you need to start recording some great footage. Don't expect this to work at night or dimmed lighting but it does wonders in my office where the lights are on 24/7. on the back it has an easy to use button layout. the first thing you are going to want to do is plug this baby up to a tv and setup the configuration. either you want it on 24/7 or capture 30 second clips when motion is detected. there is a time period you can also set it on as well. i have mine set to record constantly during the time slot im not in my office. you have the option to review the clip by pluging it to a tv or popping out the SD card which i decided to do. I mounted it high enough to where i could easily reach the sd card slot and review the footage on a daily basis. its not exactly covert and everyone has asked about it but it gets the job done quite well.

Reviews.Title: Problem tenant caught
Reviews.Author: Just a guy "Me"
Reviews.Content: We had someone writing threats and leaving them on hallway walls. We deployed two of these and within 4 days caught the tenant on video with very clear images!HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Reviews.Title: Looks good but terrible video quality in low light
Reviews.Author: William Stoker "Creative Technology Solutions"
Reviews.Content: Probably fine for commercial application with a lot of light, but inside incandescent light at night doesn't cut it to get usable video. Also, to do most of the useful configuration options like motion detection, you have to connect it to something with composite video input. Be aware of limitations before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Simple covert surveillance
Reviews.Author: Colin Ward
Reviews.Content: I use this product in a retail setting as a Loss Prevention Manager. It is easy to set up and requires only power source if you are not running it off of batteries. The SD card storage makes it easy to review video at any time. The motion setting is very nice and makes it easy to review days of video without having to fast forward through periods when no one is around. Blends easily into its surroundings which makes placement just about anywhere in the store easy to do without drawing attention to it. I like that I do not have to spent time running a coax line to connect it my DVR system since it is all self contained. There is an RCA output on the camera so you can run a line to it if you wish.The only drawbacks are that if you do run off of batteries you can only run it for about a day before the batteries are drained. It would be nice to have a longer recording time with batteries to make it even more convenient to move at the last minute without having to worry about how to get power to it if no outlet is nearby.Love this product and am looking at getting a second one.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: mirose
Reviews.Content: The product was easy to set up and worked as advertised.  Video quality was much better than I anticipated.  I would recommend this hidden camera.

Reviews.Title: SVAT PI1000
Reviews.Author: B. Harmon
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up, good quality picture. Going to purchase more in the future. Not very easy to know it is a camera, most people will think it is part of the security system

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: C. Conkey
Reviews.Content: Product arrive and works very well - very impressed with the feature set. Having said that - I do think it is overpriced. Should be sub $200.

Reviews.Title: Does not work as stated
Reviews.Author: brussell66
Reviews.Content: This was a pain to set up. The directions were useless. Unless you are going to plug this in I would not even bother because the motion sensor doesn't work properly. I was hoping to catch a thief who was stealing from my mother who was in assisted living. It did not work long enough on battery to do me any good. After several more missing dollars I am said to announce that she passed away and we never caught the thief. We gave the thing away to another lady who will have her son connect it to power. We had to put it in the closet so of course we had no power source. Very dissappointed and would not recommend this product. Would have sent it back but I gave it away the same day my mother passed. I was very upset! The only good thing I can say is that the picture quality was good enough you would be able to identify someone...if you can catch them that is.

Reviews.Title: SVAT PI1000
Reviews.Author: William R Cumbie
Reviews.Content: The Unit Works ok, but the picture quality in low light is poor...otherwise it works pretty good
